Okpu Fulani bụ okpu eriri conical nwere ngwa akpụkpọ anụ nke sitere n'aka ndị Fulani nọ na West Africa
Ọ na-abụkarị ndị Wodaabe, otu ndị na-azụ ehi na-akwagharị akwagharị nke Fulani
A na-eyikarị okpu a n'elu okpu.
N'ozuzu, okpu Fulani bụ okpu nkata nke e ji eriri osisi mee
A na-ekpuchi ya na akpụkpọ anụ ma n'elu ma mgbe ụfọdụ na ihe ịchọ mma akpụkpọ anụ n'etiti
N'elu okpu ahụ, e nwere bọtịnụ nke e ji akpụkpọ anụ kpuchie
N'ala nke okpu ahụ, a na-enwekarị chinstrap nwere tassel na njedebe.
E gosipụtara okpu ndị ahụ na ndị na-agba egwu na vidiyo egwu 2018 All the Stars site n'aka onye na-ese ihe Kendrick Lamar.
